entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little while ago and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. Can I get your order number, please?
Thank you. One moment while I pull that up... Okay, I see your order for the VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the problem?
It's just not accurate. The heart rate monitor is all over the place, the sleep tracking is useless. It's a glorified pedometer! I want my money back.
I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with your VeloBand Pulse. To confirm, are you looking to return it?
Yes! That's what I said! How do I return it? This is ridiculous. I've wasted my money on a fancy smart watch that doesn't even work. Is there a restock fee?

No, sir, there is no restocking fee. At VeloFit, we offer a comprehensive return policy. We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you are well within that window.
90 days? Okay, good. Because I bought it maybe 15 days ago, I think. So what do I need to do? I need a label or something?

Yes, sir. I can email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we will process a full refund back to your original method of payment.
Alright, that sounds good. But what if the return gets lost in the mail? I don't want to be out the money and the smart watch.

Not to worry, sir. The prepaid label includes tracking, and we will be responsible for the package once it is scanned into the carrier's system. I'll send the label to the email address associated with your account, is that correct?
Yeah, that's fine. Just get this done quickly. I've already wasted enough time on this thing.

Understood. The email with the return label has been sent. Please allow a few minutes for it to arrive. The email will also have instructions for completing the return. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. I appreciate it. I hope the refund goes through without any hassle.
You're very welcome, sir. We strive to make the return process as seamless as possible. If you experience any issues, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Have a great day!
